verbs.description: Okay , [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG1: this] [V: is] [ARG2: truly hilarious] . On Saturday , Trump accused the New York Times of inventing a source for a quote about the June 12th North Korea summit . Just one problem : The source was his own spokesperson , who spoke to a whole bunch of reporters and told them to cite him exactly as they did , …
